title: Appeals court rejects Trump request to lift block on birthright order
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's order to halt automatic citizenship for children born to parents in the country without legal authorization is blocked again.

title: Trump promised a boom. Now he's bracing America for economic turbulence
shortDescription: Economic warning signs pile up as Trump pushes tariffs, DOGE cuts. Unemployment and inflation are up. Stocks and consumer confidence are down.

title: Fired fed workers are protesting weekly to lawmakers on Capitol Hill
shortDescription: Fired federal workers are ramping up their weekly Tuesday protests on Capitol Hill demanding lawmakers take action

title: Trump escalates Canada trade war, doubles tariffs on steel, aluminum
shortDescription: Trump said he would increase from 25% to 50% tariffs taking effect Wednesday for Canada after Ontario said it would raise electricity prices on U.S.

title: Trump says he is buying a Tesla in support of Elon Musk
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said on Truth Social early Tuesday morning he is buying a Tesla in support of Elon Musk.

title: Why Trump's designs for Greenland put island's election 'on steroids'
shortDescription: Elections in Greenland don't tend to draw much outside attention. President Donald Trump's expansionist designs on it have changed that.

title: Daily Briefing: US stocks take a cold plunge
shortDescription: US markets dive as Trump can't rule out a recession. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Trump team holds make-or-break Ukraine talks after Oval Office spat
shortDescription: Ukraine's position is weaker after a fight between Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelenskyy. In Saudi Arabia, the countries hope to get back on track.

title: Senate confirms Lori Chavez-DeRemer to lead the Labor Department
shortDescription: The Senate on Thursday confirmed Lori Chavez-DeRemer, a former Republican representative from Oregon, to lead the Labor Department.

title: Government shutdown in 2025? House GOP races against deadline.
shortDescription: Congress has until 11:59 p.m. Friday to avoid a government shutdown.

title: Trump touts ICE arrest of pro-Palestinian student protester
shortDescription: Mahmoud Khalil's attorneys are challenging his arrest, which raises questions about First Amendment protections for non-citizen protesters.

title: DC begins removal of Black Lives Matter mural in front of White House
shortDescription: Crews began the process to remove the yellow “Black Lives Matter” mural that was erected one block from the White House during racial justice protests in 2020.

title: Trump repurposes CBP One app to encourage migrants to self-deport
shortDescription: Critics of the Biden-era CBP One app said migrants were abusing the asylum-request system to legally enter the United States, then disappear.

title: Trump golf course in Scotland vandalized by pro-Palestinian protesters
shortDescription: Palestine Action is taking credit for the vandalization of President Donald Trump's 'Trump Turnberry' golf course in southwest Scotland.

title: NASA to close chief scientist's office amid Trump cuts
shortDescription: Janet Petro, the acting director of NASA, announced the move Monday in a memo to staff obtained by USA TODAY.

title: 'Gaza is Not 4 Sale' painted on Trump-course
shortDescription: Pro-Palestinian graffiti was sprayed on a President Donald Trump's golf course and hotel in Turnberry, Scotland.
